entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
